short_summary: Supply, delivery and offloading of up to 50 ultra low temperature freezers.
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) has a requirement for the supply, delivery, and offloading of up to 25 dual-compressor 25-28 Cubic Foot Upright Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers per year over the next 36 months...
full_summary:
### Standing Offer for Upright Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers

#### Tender Number and Details
Tender number: WS3979339903
Tender reference: WS3979339903-Doc3979464972
Amendment number: 3
Publication date: April 24, 2023
Tender closing date: May 23, 2023, at 14:00
Amendment date: May 4, 2023

#### Procurement Process and Details
Procurement category: Goods
Procurement method: Competitive – Open bidding
Notice type: Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
Selection criteria: lowest price
Trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Contract Requirements
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) requires supply, delivery, and offloading services for upright ultra-low temperature freezers with dual compressors, to expand capacity and replace existing equipment.

#### Delivery and Reporting
Deliveries will be made to the National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) Biorepository, located at [-block II, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada].
The period of the Standing Offer is 12 months, with up to two option periods, each 12 months.

#### Contact Information
Name: Nafissa Diop, SPAC/PSPC.
Email: [nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nafissa.diop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16084791?extsite=MTYwODQ3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16084791?extsite=MTYwODQ3OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Notice of Amendment
Please note that there are three amendments to the original tender notice.

#### Notes and Cautions
Bidders should refer to the notice URL to access any additional information and contact personnel should you have any questions.
